snippet: Monday’s Thunder-Grizzlies game will be an opportunity to see how great a threat Memphis will be and just how much Oklahoma City will need Russell Westbrook in the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Monday’s Thunder-Grizzlies game will be an opportunity to see how great a threat Memphis will be and just how much Oklahoma City will need Russell Westbrook in the playoffs.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game of the Week: Gauging Western Contenders
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Game of the Week: Gauging Western Contenders
